name: Stars, Kites and Darts: A Primer on Islamic Geometric Designs
base_name: Stars, Kites and Darts: A Primer on Islamic Geometric Designs
long_desc: The title of this microcourse takes it name from the dominant geometric figures found in islamic style patterns, tiling and designs, in which is provided an overview of geometric designs across various islamic cultures, their compositional styles classified and the constructive composition of representative examples demonstrated. Students assignments mirror these exercises and include simple compositional analyses and developing an islamic design of their own.
